page.title: 12Petworth Visit: Timetable
page.content: This is what happened during the day:- 10.15 Party arrived in Market Square. 10.45 Parade to Parish Church with the Canadian and Petworth Bands. 11.00 Service of Remembrance. 12.30 Official welcome by Lord Egremont in the Market Square. - Break for Lunch - 2.15 Canadian Pipes and Drums, local clog and maypole dancing in front of Petworth House. 3.15 Pipes and Drums at Old People's Homes. 4.00 Canadians reassembled at Petworth Primary School and presented us with a large Canadian flag which they wished us to fly on a flag pole outside the school. Whenever it needs renewing they will renew it for us.
